Sentencas: This paper proposes a novel approach to determine the safe zone for an intermediate-temperature solid oxide fuel cell and gas turbine hybrid system.
Titulo: Determination of safe operation zone for an intermediate-temperature solid oxide fuel cell and gas turbine hybrid system

Sentencas: The approach first ensures the compressor safety and then determines the overall system safe zone by analyzing the unsafe characteristics of main components.
Titulo: Determination of safe operation zone for an intermediate-temperature solid oxide fuel cell and gas turbine hybrid system

Sentencas: Safe performance of the hybrid system fueled with biomass gas at all operations is analyzed.
Titulo: Determination of safe operation zone for an intermediate-temperature solid oxide fuel cell and gas turbine hybrid system

Sentencas: Finally, the map of safe zone is obtained to avoid component malfunctions and system performance deterioration.
Titulo: Determination of safe operation zone for an intermediate-temperature solid oxide fuel cell and gas turbine hybrid system

Sentencas: Results show that the hybrid system can achieve a high efficiency 60.78%, which is an interesting reference for distributed power stations.
Titulo: Determination of safe operation zone for an intermediate-temperature solid oxide fuel cell and gas turbine hybrid system

Sentencas: Under all operations, two unbalanced energy zones exist, which may cause the short supply of O-2 or fuel for electrochemical reaction.
Titulo: Determination of safe operation zone for an intermediate-temperature solid oxide fuel cell and gas turbine hybrid system

Sentencas: The lower the rotational speed of gas turbine, the narrower the zone of carbon deposition takes place in the reformer or turbine inoperation caused by too low inlet temperature.
Titulo: Determination of safe operation zone for an intermediate-temperature solid oxide fuel cell and gas turbine hybrid system

Sentencas: However, the phenomenon of fuel cell thermal cracking due to over-temperature will be exacerbated.
Titulo: Determination of safe operation zone for an intermediate-temperature solid oxide fuel cell and gas turbine hybrid system

Sentencas: System layout also affects component safety especially for the fuel cell.
Titulo: Determination of safe operation zone for an intermediate-temperature solid oxide fuel cell and gas turbine hybrid system

Sentencas: In the safe zone, the system has a characteristic of high efficiency and low load with low rotational speed, vice versa.
Titulo: Determination of safe operation zone for an intermediate-temperature solid oxide fuel cell and gas turbine hybrid system

Sentencas: In other words, the powers and load adjustment ranges both decrease with decreasing rotational speed whereas the efficiency increases, which peaks at 63.43%.
Titulo: Determination of safe operation zone for an intermediate-temperature solid oxide fuel cell and gas turbine hybrid system
